data.Summary: Software and Security Engineer with 9 years experience capable of owning, leading, and maintaining multiple security related software engineering projects and large-scale security reviews spanning several quarters and containing significant ambiguity.
data.Title: Security Engineer

positions.Title: Security Engineer
positions.Description:
Tech Lead, Corporate Security,  2022-present
L4 Security Engineer, Corporate Security, 2020-2022
L3 Security Engineer, Corporate Security, 2019-2020
L2 Security Engineer, Corporate Security, 2018-2019
L1 Security Engineer, Corporate Security, 2017-2018

-Ensure the overall safety and integrity of corporate data, infrastructure, applications, and devices for all corporate identities including contractor and full-time employees

- Tech lead and SME for the Identity and Access sub-team, responsible for providing guidance and mentorship to junior engineers, upholding technical excellence through code reviews and security review critiques, and helping grow the team by completing 73+ interviews directly leading to the hiring of 6 co-workers and hosting of 2 interns

- Lead engineer responsible for the strategic direction, design, build, and ongoing ownership of “Device Trust”, Snap’s zero trust, trust inference, and device attestation framework for secure access to corporate services including Okta applications, Google Workspace native applications, and custom-built services deployed in a cloud agnostic environment

- Lead engineer responsible for designing, creating, and maintaining “SaaSy”, Snap’s custom in-house Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) and SaaS security service, providing a technical enforcement of unapproved or risky applications (shadow SaaS), visibility into sensitive content transfers between SaaS solutions, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) rules to remediate accidental information disclosure or insider risk threats, and managed browser security policies

- Proven track record of completing large-scale, complex, multi-quarter security reviews spanning multiple teams. Example reviews include supporting secure access for 1,000+ vendor accounts and scaling company-wide revenue with Oracle ERP, secure storage of all macOS and Linux end-user device keys and recovery passwords, and revising sensitive service access to Ukraine employees during the RU invasion

positions.Title: Cybersecurity Analyst
positions.Description:
- Assist in automation and API integration
- Engineer tools for specific settings through custom built scripts and programs
- Assist in deployment of pre-existing tools
- Perform intrusion detection and escalation using SIEM technology
- Perform updates and tuning on IDS/IPS devices and firewalls
- Assist as required in remediation of critical information security incidents.
- Maintains knowledge of information security policies and goals
- Keeps current on the current IT threat landscape and upcoming trends in security

positions.Title: Associate
positions.Description:
• Find market trends in relevant real estate markets
• Gather preliminary information before valuation period – comparable sales, property information and    mapping. 
• Visit property to ensure information is accurate through on-site measurements

positions.Title: Gaucho
positions.Description:
•	Prepare, cook and serve all meats to proper customers
•	Ensure cleanliness of work area
•	Maintain a positive attitude with staff and customers

positions.Title: Assistant Property Supervisor
positions.Description:
*	Maintain a positive relationship between Tenants and Property Owners
*	Supervise all Resident Manager operations and requests
*	Manage and direct Tenant maintenance requests and repairs
*	Work with Government agencies to ensure buildings follow all Government regulations

positions.Title: Events Staff
positions.Description:
*	Conduct set-ups and take-downs in facilities for events in a timely manner.
*	Ensure event rooms are scheduled appropriately.
*	Ensure all event arrangements are accurate by working closely with contact

positions.Title: Sterile Processing Technician
positions.Description:
*	Assembly of all medical equipment required for procedure or surgery
*	Sterilization of all medical equipment after procedure or surgery
*	Responsible for proper inventory and ordering of equipment as needed
